mapper.select: select * from( select c.*,rownum rn from( select a.no, c.name as storename, a.name, a.price, a.maker, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') as reg_date, to_char(b.EXPIRY_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') as expiry_date, ceil(sysdate-a.reg_date) as newdate, e.IMAGEURL, ceil(b.expiry_date-sysdate) as remainderdate, (ceil(((d.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price)/7)) countprice, a.price*0.5 as halfprice, b.count, b.mount, b.PRODUCT_NO, b.STORE_NO from product a, storeproduct b, store c, productkind d, boardsfilepr e where b.STORE_NO=#{store_no} and a.no=e.no and d.no=a.KIND_NO and a.no=b.PRODUCT_NO and c.no=b.STORE_NO order by PRODUCT_NO,STORE_NO asc) c) where #{page_start}<=rn and rn<=#{page_end}

select * from( select c.*,rownum rn from( select a.no, a.NAME, a.PRICE,to_char(a.reg_date,'yyyy.mm.dd'), to_char(a.EXPIRY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'), a.maker, d.imageurl, a.count, ceil(sysdate-a.reg_date) as newdate, ceil(a.expiry_date-sysdate) as remainderdate, (ceil(((b.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price)/7)) countprice, ((b.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price) as maxcountprice, a.price*0.5 as halfprice from product a, productkind b, boardsfilepr d where a.KIND_NO=b.NO and a.NO=d.NO and (a.NAME like #{keyword} or b.KIND like #{keyword}) order by price desc, a.EXPIRY_DATE asc) c) where #{page_start}<=rn and rn<=#{page_end}

SELECT seq_product.nextVal as no FROM DUAL
insert into product( no, name, price,reg_date,expiry_date,maker,kind_no,count) values ( #{no}, #{name}, #{price}, #{reg_date}, #{expiry_date}, #{maker}, #{kind_no}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT c.no, c.name,c.reg_date, c.expiry_date, c.maker, c.IMAGEURL,c.countprice,c.price,c.maxcountprice,c.halfprice FROM (SELECT a.no, a.name, a.price, a.reg_date, ceil(a.expiry_date-sysdate) as expiry_date, a.maker, b.IMAGEURL, ((c.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price) as maxcountprice, (ceil(((c.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price)/7)) countprice, a.price*0.5 as halfprice FROM product a, boardsfilepr b,productkind c where a.KIND_NO=c.no and a.no = b.no and (a.EXPIRY_DATE-sysdate)>=1 and (a.EXPIRY_DATE-sysdate)<=7 and expiry_date > sysdate ORDER BY expiry_date) c WHERE rownum < 5

SELECT c.no,c.name, c.price, c.reg_date, c.expiry_date, c.maker, c.IMAGEURL FROM (SELECT a.no, a.name, a.price, a.reg_date, a.expiry_date, a.maker, b.IMAGEURL FROM product a, boardsfilepr b where a.no = b.no ORDER BY reg_date desc) c WHERE rownum < 5

SELECT c.no,c.name, c.price, c.reg_date, c.expiry_date, c.maker, c.IMAGEURL,c.count FROM (SELECT a.no, a.name, a.price, a.reg_date, a.expiry_date, a.maker, b.IMAGEURL,a.count FROM product a, boardsfilepr b where a.no = b.no ORDER BY count desc) c WHERE rownum < 5

SELECT c.no, c.name, c.price, c.reg_date, c.expiry_date, c.maker, c.IMAGEURL FROM(select a.no, a.name, a.price, a.reg_date, a.expiry_date, a.maker, b.IMAGEURL FROM product a, boardsfilepr b where a.no = b.no order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) c WHERE rownum < 5
mapper.update: update product set count = count + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.name, a.price, to_char(a.expiry_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') as expiry_date, a.maker, b.IMAGEURL, ceil((a.EXPIRY_DATE-sysdate)-7) as remainderdate, ceil(a.expiry_date-sysdate) as remaindercountdate, (ceil(((c.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price)/7)) countprice, ((c.DIS_PERCENT*0.01)*a.price) as maxcountprice, a.price*0.5 as halfprice FROM product a, boardsfilepr b, PRODUCTKIND c where a.no = b.no and c.no=a.KIND_NO and a.no=#{no}

SELECT c.no, c.name, c.price, c.maker, c.IMAGEURL FROM(select a.no, a.name, a.price, a.maker, b.IMAGEURL FROM product a, boardsfilepr b where a.no = b.no and a.price < 1000 order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) c WHERE rownum < 2

SELECT c.no, c.name, c.price, c.maker, c.IMAGEURL FROM(select a.no, a.name, a.price, a.maker, b.IMAGEURL FROM product a, boardsfilepr b where a.no = b.no and a.price < 2000 and a.price > 1000 order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) c WHERE rownum < 2
